298fc19b-121b-4267-af03-e79df64f5042.name: 标志性装备
298fc19b-121b-4267-af03-e79df64f5042.notes: Gear is worth (starting wealth)/10 per level

a480a5fc-7842-4797-874d-342d28725750.name: 战斗反射
a480a5fc-7842-4797-874d-342d28725750.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

4e720d71-fcb1-431c-95e2-65189e62531d.name: 幸运
4e720d71-fcb1-431c-95e2-65189e62531d.notes: 游戏的每个小时可用一次

5fb2b488-8576-4ff9-950e-91d0e5f92c77.name: Weapon Bond
5fb2b488-8576-4ff9-950e-91d0e5f92c77.notes: You own a Weapon that is uniquely suited to you.

796f2c17-cfc8-4e40-ba08-20fc1641a2f5.notes: React to others at +4; -2 to IQ-based skills when alone, or -1 in a group of 4 or less

61fb5cd9-955d-4036-b7d3-fc8aa80b9f8a.text: For the Swashbuckler loadout, choose Bladed Ruffian or Gentleman Adventurer, then add a Weapon lens.  Several loadout combinations require points in Signature Gear or traded for cash.  See DF13:26 for more information.
